GSD.product_version: versions from v3.0 to before v5.10.150
GSD.description:
firmware: google: Test spinlock on panic path to avoid lockups

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.150 by commit ab5a3e714437bbd944cf1d6d1cec819c3ed826aa, it was introduced in version v3.0 by commit 74c5b31c6618f01079212332b2e5f6c42f2d6307. For more details please see the references link.
